column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk Provincial------Â Gendarmerie raided a property where a group of Chinese were holding their own countrymen captive for ransom.------The operation took place on the morning of the 13th of November
column10: Brigadier Heng Bunty told local media that the operation had detained two Chinese suspects and rescued four Chinese victims who were injured after being tortured by the suspects.------The force also took several pairs of handcuffs used by the suspects. ------TVFB
